statements.statement: SELECT /*+ 위상규::/gcb/batch/cmnDatSynchMg/cmnDatRcp/cmnDatTblVlnJob/CmnDatTblVln/retvLstCmnDatTblClmn */ A.COLUMN_NAME 공통데이터테이블컬럼명_V128 , A.DATA_TYPE 공통데이터테이블컬럼타입_V128 , A.DATA_LENGTH 공통데이터테이블컬럼길이_N5 , A.DATA_SCALE 공통데이터테이블컬럼소수점길이_N5 , A.COLUMN_ID 공통데이터테이블컬럼ID_N5 FROM (SELECT COLUMN_NAME , CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'TIMESTAMP(6)' THEN 'VARCHAR2' ELSE DATA_TYPE END DATA_TYPE , CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'NUMBER' THEN DATA_PRECISION WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'TIMESTAMP(6)' THEN 20 ELSE DATA_LENGTH END DATA_LENGTH , CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'TIMESTAMP(6)' THEN NULL ELSE DATA_SCALE END DATA_SCALE , COLUMN_ID FROM SYS.ALL_TAB_COLS WHERE 1 = 1 AND OWNER = 'INSTC' AND TABLE_NAME = DECODE(${공통데이터테이블명}, 'TBGCBUI03', 'TBGCBUI02', ${공통데이터테이블명}) ORDER BY COLUMN_ID) A ORDER BY A.COLUMN_ID
